---
id: delete-organization
title: "Delete organization"
description: "Deletes the organization identified by the given `orgId`. This operation permanently removes the organization and associated memberships."

<Heading

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/orgs/{orgId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>

</MethodEndpoint>



Deletes the organization identified by the given `orgId`. This operation permanently removes the organization and associated memberships.

  id={"request"}
